output:
{
  "nodes": [
    {
      "id": "node-0",
      "label": "Great Decoupling",
      "summary": "The fundamental fracture between productivity gains and wage growth caused by AI.",
      "depth": 9.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 0,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.92
    },
    {
      "id": "node-1",
      "label": "Historical Productivity‑Wage Orthodoxy",
      "summary": "The long‑standing belief that technological progress lifts both capital and labor.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 1,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.88
    },
    {
      "id": "node-2",
      "label": "AI as Catalyst Breaking the Link",
      "summary": "Generative AI and autonomous agents replace cognitive labor, severing the productivity‑wage relationship.",
      "depth": 9.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 2,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-3",
      "label": "Evidence: Silent Firing & Headcount Decoupling",
      "summary": "Corporate tactics that force voluntary turnover and leave roles unfilled, showing AI‑driven efficiency.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 3,
      "type": "evidence",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-4",
      "label": "GDP Growth Decoupled from Labor",
      "summary": "AI‑driven productivity raises potential GDP while labor‑force participation stalls.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 4,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.89
    },
    {
      "id": "node-5",
      "label": "Declining Labor Share of Income",
      "summary": "A shrinking portion of GDP is paid as wages as value accrues to compute and software owners.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 5,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.86
    },
    {
      "id": "node-6",
      "label": "K‑Shaped Economic Reality",
      "summary": "A bifurcated economy where AI‑haves prosper and AI‑have‑nots experience stagnant or falling wages.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 6,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.88
    },
    {
      "id": "node-7",
      "label": "Productivity Paradox & Wage Stagnation",
      "summary": "Rising productivity in AI‑exposed sectors does not translate into broad‑based wage gains.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 7,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.84
    },
    {
      "id": "node-8",
      "label": "Silent Firing Tactics",
      "summary": "Deliberate degradation of work conditions to induce resignations without severance.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 8,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.90
    },
    {
      "id": "node-9",
      "label": "Great Flattening of Middle Management",
      "summary": "AI tools eliminate supervisory layers, expanding span of control for remaining leaders.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 9,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.87
    },
    {
      "id": "node-10",
      "label": "Agentic Workforce & AI Agents",
      "summary": "Autonomous AI agents execute end‑to‑end workflows, enabling single humans to command whole departments.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 10,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.91
    },
    {
      "id": "node-11",
      "label": "Sector‑Specific Displacement",
      "summary": "Technology, BPO, professional services, and creative industries face acute AI‑driven job loss.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 11,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.85
    },
    {
      "id": "node-12",
      "label": "Collapse of the Entry‑Level Pipeline",
      "summary": "AI replaces junior tasks, eliminating graduate hiring and the traditional talent ladder.",
      "depth": 8.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 12,
      "type": "mechanism",
      "clarityScore": 0.89
    },
    {
      "id": "node-13",
      "label": "AI Precariat & Identity Crisis",
      "summary": "A new class of insecure workers experiences psychological stress and loss of occupational identity.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 13,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.84
    },
    {
      "id": "node-14",
      "label": "Policy Lag & Patchwork Regulation",
      "summary": "EU AI Act, fragmented US rules, and slow legislative response leave workers unprotected.",
      "depth": 5.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 14,
      "type": "evidence",
      "clarityScore": 0.80
    },
    {
      "id": "node-15",
      "label": "UBI & Robot Tax Proposals",
      "summary": "Debates on universal basic income and taxing AI‑generated value as financing mechanisms.",
      "depth": 6.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 15,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.82
    },
    {
      "id": "node-16",
      "label": "Worst‑Case Scenarios (2030+)",
      "summary": "Persistent structural unemployment, social unrest, and potential sabotage of AI infrastructure.",
      "depth": 5.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 16,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.81
    },
    {
      "id": "node-17",
      "label": "Conclusion: Distributional Challenge",
      "summary": "Economic growth continues while labor shrinks; the central problem becomes how to share AI‑generated wealth.",
      "depth": 7.0,
      "sequenceIndex": 17,
      "type": "concept",
      "clarityScore": 0.88
    }
  ],

  "metadata": {
    "trajectory": "The narrative begins by overturning the historic productivity‑wage link (Great Decoupling) and identifies AI as the engine of that rupture. This triggers a cascade: AI‑driven GDP growth uncouples from labor, labor’s share of income falls, and a K‑shaped economy emerges. The report then details the mechanisms—silent firing, flattening of management, and autonomous AI agents—that operationalize the decoupling across sectors, culminating in the collapse of entry‑level pipelines and the rise of an AI‑Precariat. Policy lag, UBI/robot‑tax debates, and worst‑case scenarios are presented as responses, ending with a call to resolve the distributional challenge posed by a growing economy that no longer needs human labor.",
    "depthScore": 7.2,
    "totalUnits": 18
  }
}
